topic.title: REFERRAL RATE FOR CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED)
topic.shortdesc: REFERRAL RATE FOR CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED) is the percentage of women who attend a Breast Screening who receive a REFERRAL REQUEST for PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Codes 'Needle Biopsyfor Cytology (Fine Needle Aspiration or Cytology)' or 'Needle Biopsyfor Histology (Wide Bore Needle or Core Biopsy)' as part of the Breast Assessment process.
